Fields:
#!/bin/bash

if [ ! -d /sdk/dotnet-sdk ]; then
  mkdir /sdk/dotnet-sdk
  IFS=:
  for dir in $PATH; do
    if [ "$dir" != "" ] && [ "$dir" != "$(dirname "$0")" ] && [ -f "$dir/dotnet" ]; then
      cp -n "$dir/dotnet" /sdk/dotnet-sdk/
      cp -rnsT "$dir/" /sdk/dotnet-sdk
    fi
  done
fi

exec /sdk/dotnet-sdk/dotnet "$@"
